sn35.70:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā upavāṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn35.70:1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā upavāṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.70:1.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti, akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
sn35.70:2.1: “Idha pana, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:2.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:2.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:2.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:2.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35.70:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rasappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rasarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:3.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:3.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rasappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rasarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:3.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgo’ti pajānāti. Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35.70:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:4.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:4.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35.70:4.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:4.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe… paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35.70:5.1: Idha pana, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti, no ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī.
sn35.70:5.2: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:5.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedīhi kho hoti, no ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī.
sn35.70:5.4: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:5.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti, akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35.70:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rasappaṭisaṃvedīhi kho hoti, no ca rasarāgappaṭisaṃvedī. Asantañca ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgo’ti pajānāti …pe….
sn35.70:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedīhi kho hoti, no ca dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī.
sn35.70:7.2: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:7.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedīhi kho hoti, no ca dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī.
sn35.70:7.4: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35.70:7.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti, akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
